about_the_game:
You're late. We were about to start without you.
Through that elevator on your left, please. And then down the hallway - don't lollygag, we're behind enough as it is.
If the elevator stops, under no circumstances should you exit before reaching the correct floor. Repeat that to me please so I know you understood it.
Ok, thank you.

When you get there, take a seat at the center table. The test will begin shortly. Do not speak to the other participants. Do not take any photographs. Do not write down your memories of it. And do not look directly into the slide projector.

What? No, it's a slide projector - it won't do any damage. But you won't be able to see. And we need you to see.
----------------


Join the if you have feedback or suggestions for The Test. Or you just wanna frickin hang. 

Follow the instagram or tiktok for updates. Or if you also just wanna frickin hang, man.



WARNING:

A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns. Even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy may have an undiagnosed condition that can cause these “photosensitive epileptic seizures” while playing.
Immediately stop playing and consult a doctor if you experience any symptoms.
Silkbulb Test has certain sections with intense flashing lights - play at your own risk.

content_descriptors.notes: Disturbing images are frequent. Play at your own risk.

detailed_description:
You're late. We were about to start without you.
Through that elevator on your left, please. And then down the hallway - don't lollygag, we're behind enough as it is.
If the elevator stops, under no circumstances should you exit before reaching the correct floor. Repeat that to me please so I know you understood it.
Ok, thank you.

When you get there, take a seat at the center table. The test will begin shortly. Do not speak to the other participants. Do not take any photographs. Do not write down your memories of it. And do not look directly into the slide projector.

What? No, it's a slide projector - it won't do any damage. But you won't be able to see. And we need you to see.
----------------


Join the if you have feedback or suggestions for The Test. Or you just wanna frickin hang. 

Follow the instagram or tiktok for updates. Or if you also just wanna frickin hang, man.



WARNING:

A very small percentage of people may experience a seizure when exposed to certain visual images, including flashing lights or patterns. Even people who have no history of seizures or epilepsy may have an undiagnosed condition that can cause these “photosensitive epileptic seizures” while playing.
Immediately stop playing and consult a doctor if you experience any symptoms.
Silkbulb Test has certain sections with intense flashing lights - play at your own risk.
name: silkbulb test

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: TBD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD r5 3600
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: TBD
